title: Activate menubar switches mode from reading to interaction
instructions: Navigate to the 'Text Formatting' menubar | Activate the 'Text Formatting' menubar
assertion1: Screen reader switching to interaction mode is conveyed by opening the menu item

title: Navigation to menubar switches mode from reading to interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the link just before the meunbar
assertion1: Screen reader switching to interaction mode is conveyed

title: Navigation to menubar using reading mode
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the link just before the meunbar
assertion2: The menubar name 'Text Formatting' is conveyed
assertion3: Number of items in menubar is conveyed

title: Navigate to menu item in menubar using reading mode
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Font' menu item
assertion2: The menu item opens a popup is conveyed
assertion3: 2: The position and size of the submenu  is conveyed
assertion5: 2: The state of the popup being open is converyed

title: Navigate to menu item in menubar using interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Font' menu item
assertion2: The menu item opens a popup is conveyed
assertion3: 2: The position and size of the submenu  is conveyed
assertion5: 2: The state of the popup being open is converyed

title: Navigate to menu item radio in submenu using interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Font' menu item
instructions: Navigate to 'Sans-serif' menu item in the 'Font' submenu
assertion2: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position and size of the submenu  is conveyed

title: Navigate to menu item checkbox in interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Style/Color' menu item
instructions: Open "Style/Color" menu  | Navigate to 'Bold' menu item
assertion2: The role 'menu item checkbox' is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position and size of the submenu  is conveyed
assertion5: 2: The group role and name 'Font Style' is conveyed

title: Open submenu in reading mode
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Text Align' menu item
instructions: Open 'Text Align' submenu and move focus to 'Left' menu item
assertion2: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
assertion3: 2: The position and size of the submenu  is conveyed

title: Open submenu in interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Text Align' menu item
instructions: Open 'Text Align' submenu and move focus to 'Left' menu item
assertion2: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
assertion3: 2: The position and size of the submenu  is conveyed

title: Close submenu in interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Text Align' menu item
instructions: Open 'Text Align' submenu using down arrow key |  navigate to 'Left' menu item | Close 'Text Align' submenu and move focus to 'Text Align' menu item
assertion2: The menu item opens a popup is conveyed
assertion3: 2: Closed state of the submenu is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position and size of the menubar  is conveyed

title: Read menu item in menubar in reading mode
setupScriptDescription: Move focus to the 'Size' menu item
instructions: Review the  'Size' menu item in the menubar
assertion2: The menu item opens a popup is conveyed
assertion3: 2: Closed state of the submenu is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position and size of the menubar  is conveyed

title: Read menu item in menubar in interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Move focus to the 'Size' menu item
instructions: Review the  'Size' menu item in the menubar
assertion2: The menu item opens a popup is conveyed
assertion3: 2: Closed state of the submenu is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position and size of the menubar  is conveyed

title: Read menu item radio button in submenu in interaction mode
task: read menuitemradio in a group in a submenu
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Style/Color' menu item
instructions: Open "Style/Color" menu using the down arrow key | Navigate to 'Blue' menu item | Review the  'Blue' menu item radio in the 'Style/Color' submenu
assertion2: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position and size of the menubar  is conveyed
assertion5: 2: The group role and name 'Text Color' is conveyed

title: Read menu item radio button in submenu in interaction mode
task: read menuitemradio in a group in a submenu
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Style/Color' menu item
instructions: Open "Style/Color" menu using the down arrow key | Navigate to 'Blue' menu item | Review the  'Blue' menu item radio in the 'Style/Color' submenu
assertion2: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position and size of the menubar  is conveyed
assertion5: 2: The group role and name 'Text Color' is conveyed

title: Read menu item checkbox in submenu in interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Style/Color' menu item
instructions: Open "Style/Color" menu using the down arrow key | Navigate to 'Italic' menu item | Review the 'Italic' menu item
assertion2: The role 'menu item checkbox' is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position and size of the submenu  is conveyed
assertion5: 2: The group role and name 'Font Style' is conveyed

title: Read disabled menu item in submenu in interaction mode
task: read disabled menuitem in a submenu
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Size' menu item
instructions: Open "Size" menu | Navigate to 'X-Large" menuitem | Activate "X-Large" menu item |Open "Size" menu | Navigate to 'Larger" menuitem | Review the 'Larger' menu item
assertion4: 2: The position and size of the submenu  is conveyed
